long_desc: You have come before Ali, fourth and last of the Rashidun.
flags_raw: Some view him as the closest to God among all of the Caliphs, the one
stats1_raw: most deserving of our respect and reverence.  Still others saw him as
stats2_raw: a schismatic, a heretic, one to be killed and forgotten.  To look at
stats3_raw: him now is for you to decide for yourself.
